about_the_game:
That day, the sky was also snowing scarlet—

Outside of Baili Town, on a snowy night,

Shiye, a "Qianye" expert capable of solving a thousand problems,

Driven by fate, became the "Way of the Goddess."

In the future of a thousand nights,

He shoulders the sacred mission of nurturing the "Goddess Seed" Lilies—

A lovely girl—into an outstanding goddess.

The story of Shiye and Lilies begins from this moment...

Game's 5 Major Systems

  • Romance: Nine different female character storylines to guide you on various paths to success.

  • Training: Twenty-seven different professions for Lilies to train in, making her the ultimate goddess!

  • Adventure: Explore unknown worlds, challenge the four strongest elemental beasts.

  • Synthesis: Unleash your creativity, create new items, and enhance personal attributes.

  • Missions: Solve a thousand different problems in Baili Town, complete the final mission of the "Qianye," and become a renowned expert!

New Features in the Remaster Version

  • Significantly enhanced resolution support for a higher definition experience!

  • The number of save slots increased to 100, compatible with Steam cloud save, you don’t have to worry about losing your save games anymore!

  • Compatible with Xbox spec controllers, allowing you to freely switch between mouse, keyboard, and gamepad!

  • New Game Plus feature that retains levels, items, outfits, and synthesis recipes, making it easier to complete all game elements!

  • Multi-language support! You can switch between different languages in the settings. In addition to the current Traditional Chinese and Simplified Chinese (interface still in development), English, Japanese, and more are planned to be added!

During this time, different choices and events will influence Lilies's growth, shaping her into different types of goddesses. Beyond Lilies's goddess ending, the game also features Shiye's "Qianye" ending and the endings of other major female characters—all within the player's control.

As an "Qianye," Shiye naturally maintains good relationships with the residents of Baili Town. The city is home to six charming girls, all friends of Shiye. They are scattered throughout different areas, including classrooms, churches, hospitals, circuses, and shops. Shiye can chat with them at any time, and if lucky, receive small gifts from the girls. When the girls encounter unsolvable problems, Shiye must use his Qianye abilities to help them. As the story unfolds, Shiye has the chance to earn the girls' recognition and embark on romantic and touching love stories.

One direct method to cultivate Lilies into an outstanding goddess is through Qianye training. By talking to supporting characters in the city, Shiye can choose different training options for Lilies. Initially, there are only a few training options available, but as proficiency increases, Lilies can attempt more challenging training, totaling 27 different options. Each job affects Lilies's attributes differently, and costs vary. Randomly choosing training can lead to growth issues for Lilies and financial strain for Shiye, so careful selection is essential.

Shiye and Lilies can venture beyond the city to explore the vast world. The areas surrounding Baili Town—forests, snow-capped mountains, graveyards, and deserts—hold numerous treasures for adventurers. However, each location is guarded by monsters. When Shiye and Lilies encounter them, they must use weapons and magic to defeat these foes. After battles, they accumulate combat experience and have a chance to obtain valuable items and food. As their combat abilities improve, they may even face powerful mysterious enemies. Onward to becoming stronger, Shiye!

Inside the Four Seasons House, there's an "Alchemy Furnace." Placing different items inside triggers automatic synthesis. Shiye can turn food into high-quality ingredients or transform ordinary items into potent healing potions. The possibilities are endless. Precious items resulting from synthesis can be sold at high prices or handed over to designated characters in the city to complete quests. Different synthesis recipes are found in various locations within and outside the city. Collect them all to increase the chances of successful synthesis. The game features over a thousand synthesis recipes—aim to collect them all!

In Baili Town, residents frequently need assistance. This is when Shiye's "Qianye" skills come into play. Depending on his abilities, Shiye can choose different types of quests. Successfully completing residents' requests not only provides monetary rewards (a significant source of income for Shiye) but also offers a chance to obtain valuable items and learn new synthesis recipes. The fate of the Four Seasons House becoming a nationally renowned shop depends on how many quests Shiye can complete.

Remember, as Shiye, you have the power to shape Lilies into a remarkable goddess. Your choices, interactions, and adventures will determine her path. Whether it's through romance, training, adventure, synthesis, or solving the city's myriad problems, your journey awaits!

Special Thanks
